title: Looking for great font management software?
content:
I am looking for a great and inexpensive font management software that is reliable. I am a mac user. I would love any recommendations from people who have used more than one font manager. If you know of a software that is not great I would love to know that as well.

Sorting and browsing by category would be great.
author: Holy Donuts

comments.content:
I'm using Extensis Suitcase 11. Both on Windows and Mac and would highly recommend it.

Although this article is from 2008, it's might still be of any help:  
 [http://www.smashingmagazine.com/2008/09/05/25-font-management-tools-revi...](http://web.archive.org/web/20140714144150/http:/www.smashingmagazine.com/2008/09/05/25-font-management-tools-reviewed/ "http://www.smashingmagazine.com/2008/09/05/25-font-management-tools-reviewed/")
For Mac it's definitely Fontcase. It's a real beaut.
